query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
1 In forma dunque di candida rosa 2 mi si mostrava la milizia santa 3 che nel suo sangue Cristo fece sposa;
4 ma l’altra, che volando vede e canta 5 la gloria di colui che la ’nnamora 6 e la bontà che la fece cotanta,
7 sì come schiera d’ape che s’infiora 8 una fïata e una si ritorna 9 là dove suo laboro s’insapora,
10 nel gran fior discendeva che s’addorna 11 di tante foglie, e quindi risaliva 12 là dove ’l süo amor sempre soggiorna.
query.result:
**English:**
1 In the form, then, of a white rose 2 the holy host showed itself to me, 3 which Christ made his bride with his blood;
4 but the other, which flying sees and sings 5 the glory of him who enamors it 6 and the goodness that made it so great,
7 like a troop of bees that flowers itself 8 at one time and at another returns 9 to where its labor is savored,
10 descended into the great flower that adorns itself 11 with so many petals, and then reascended 12 to where its love always dwells.
**Malay:**
1 Dalam bentuk bunga mawar putih 2 bala tentara suci menunjukkan dirinya kepadaku, 3 yang Kristus jadikan pengantinnya dengan darahnya;
4 tetapi yang lain, yang terbang melihat dan menyanyi 5 kemuliaan dia yang membuatnya jatuh cinta 6 dan kebaikan yang membuatnya begitu agung,
7 seperti sekawanan lebah yang menghiasi dirinya sendiri 8 pada suatu waktu dan pada waktu lain kembali 9 ke tempat di mana pekerjaannya dinikmati,
10 turun ke bunga besar yang menghiasi dirinya sendiri 11 dengan begitu banyak kelopak, dan kemudian naik kembali 12 ke tempat di mana cintanya selalu tinggal.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
13 Le facce tutte avean di fiamma viva 14 e l’ali d’oro, e l’altro tanto bianco, 15 che nulla neve a quel termine arriva.
query.result:
**English:**
13 Their faces all had a living flame, 14 and their wings were gold, and the rest so white, 15 that no snow reaches that level.
**Malay:**
13 Semua wajah mereka memiliki nyala api yang hidup, 14 dan sayap mereka berwarna emas, dan bagian lainnya sangat putih, 15 sehingga tidak ada salju yang mencapai tingkat itu.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
16 Quando scendean nel fior, di banco in banco 17 porgevan de la pace e de l’ardore 18 ch’elli acquistavan ventilando il fianco.
query.result:
**English:**
16 When they descended into the flower, from bench to bench 17 they offered some of the peace and the ardor 18 that they acquired by fanning their sides.
**Malay:**
16 Ketika mereka turun ke bunga, dari bangku ke bangku 17 mereka memberikan sebagian kedamaian dan semangat 18 yang mereka peroleh dengan mengipasi sisi-sisi mereka.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
19 Né l’interporsi tra ’l disopra e ’l fiore 20 di tanta moltitudine volante 21 impediva la vista e lo splendore:
22 ché la luce divina è penetrante 23 per l’universo secondo ch’è degno, 24 sì che nulla le puote essere ostante.
query.result:
**English:**
19 Nor did the interposition between the above and the flower 20 of so great a flying multitude 21 impede the sight and the splendor:
22 for the divine light is penetrating 23 through the universe according to its worthiness, 24 so that nothing can obstruct it.
**Malay:**
19 Dan perantara antara bagian atas dan bunga 20 dari sekumpulan besar yang terbang 21 tidak menghalangi pandangan dan cahaya:
22 karena cahaya ilahi itu menembus 23 ke seluruh alam semesta sesuai dengan nilainya, 24 sehingga tidak ada yang dapat menghalanginya.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
25 Questo sicuro e gaudïoso regno, 26 frequente in gente antica e in novella, 27 viso e amore avea tutto ad un segno.
query.result:
**English:**
25 This secure and joyful kingdom, 26 frequented by people of old and new, 27 had its face and love all in one sign.
**Malay:**
25 Kerajaan yang aman dan gembira ini, 26 sering dikunjungi oleh orang-orang zaman dahulu dan zaman sekarang, 27 wajah dan cintanya semuanya pada satu tanda.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
28 O trina luce che ’n unica stella 29 scintillando a lor vista, sì li appaga! 30 guarda qua giuso a la nostra procella!
31 Se i barbari, venendo da tal plaga 32 che ciascun giorno d’Elice si cuopra, 33 rotante col suo figlio ond’ ella è vaga,
34 veggendo Roma e l’ardüa sua opra, 35 stupefaciensi, quando Laterano 36 a le cose mortali andò di sopra;
37 ïo, che al divino da l’umano, 38 a l’etterno dal tempo era venuto, 39 e di Fiorenza in popol giusto e sano,
40 di che stupor dovea esser compiuto! 41 Certo tra esso e ’l gaudio mi facea 42 libito non udire e starmi muto.
query.result:
**English:**
28 O threefold light that in a single star 29 sparkling before their sight, so quenches them! 30 Look down here upon our tempest!
31 If the barbarians, coming from such a region 32 that every day covers itself with the constellation of the Wain, 33 rotating with its son around which it revolves,
34 seeing Rome and its arduous work, 35 were astounded when the Lateran 36 surpassed all mortal things;
37 I, who had come from the human to the divine, 38 from time to eternity, 39 and from Florence to a just and sane people,
40 with what astonishment should I have been filled! 41 Surely between it and joy I was made 42 to desire not to hear and to remain silent.
**Malay:**
28 Wahai cahaya tiga yang dalam bintang tunggal 29 berkelap-kelip di hadapan pandangan mereka, begitu memadamkan mereka! 30 Lihatlah ke bawah ke arah badai kami!
31 Jika orang-orang barbar, datang dari wilayah seperti itu 32 yang setiap hari menutupi dirinya dengan konstelasi Biduk, 33 berputar dengan putranya yang mengelilinginya,
34 melihat Roma dan kerja kerasnya, 35 tercengang ketika Lateran 36 melampaui semua hal yang fana;
37 Aku, yang telah datang dari manusia ke ilahi, 38 dari waktu ke keabadian, 39 dan dari Florence ke orang-orang yang adil dan waras,
40 dengan keheranan apa aku seharusnya dipenuhi! 41 Tentu saja antara itu dan kegembiraan aku dibuat 42 untuk tidak ingin mendengar dan tetap diam.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
43 E quasi peregrin che si ricrea 44 nel tempio del suo voto riguardando, 45 e spera già ridir com’ ello stea,
46 su per la viva luce passeggiando, 47 menava ïo li occhi per li gradi, 48 mo sù, mo giù e mo recirculando.
query.result:
**English:**
43 And like a pilgrim who, reposing 44 in the temple of his vow, looks around, 45 and hopes already to return and tell how it was,
46 so, walking along the living light, 47 I moved my eyes over the slopes, 48 now up, now down, and now circling around.
**Malay:**
43 Dan bagai seorang peziarah yang beristirahat 44 di kuil sumpahnya, melihat sekeliling, 45 dan berharap untuk kembali dan menceritakan bagaimana keadaannya,
46 demikianlah, berjalan di sepanjang cahaya yang hidup, 47 aku menggerakkan mataku ke lereng-lereng, 48 kadang ke atas, kadang ke bawah, dan kadang berputar-putar.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
49 Vedëa visi a carità süadi, 50 d’altrui lume fregiati e di suo riso, 51 e atti ornati di tutte onestadi.
query.result:
**English:**
49 I saw all those who were courteous and kind, 50 adorned with the light of others and their own smiles, 51 and their actions were adorned with all virtues.
**Malay:**
49 Aku melihat semua orang yang sopan dan baik hati, 50 dihiasi dengan cahaya orang lain dan senyuman mereka sendiri, 51 dan tindakan mereka dihiasi dengan semua kebaikan.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
58 Uno intendëa, e altro mi rispuose: 59 credea veder Beatrice e vidi un sene 60 vestito con le genti glorïose.
query.result:
**English:**
58 One understood, and the other answered me: 59 I thought to see Beatrice and I saw an elder 60 dressed with the glorious people.
**Malay:**
58 Yang satu mengerti, dan yang lain menjawabku: 59 Aku pikir akan melihat Beatrice dan aku melihat seorang tua 60 berpakaian dengan orang-orang mulia.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
61 Diffuso era per li occhi e per le gene 62 di benigna letizia, in atto pio 63 quale a tenero padre si convene.
query.result:
**English:**
61 Diffused was through the eyes and through the cheeks 62 of benign joy, in pious act 63 as befits a tender father.
**Malay:**
61 Tersebar melalui mata dan pipi 62 kegembiraan yang lembut, dalam tindakan yang saleh 63 sebagaimana layaknya seorang ayah yang lembut.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
70 Sanza risponder, li occhi sù levai, 71 e vidi lei che si facea corona 72 reflettendo da sé li etterni rai.
query.result:
**English:**
70 Without answering, I raised my eyes, 71 and I saw her who was making a crown for herself, 72 reflecting from herself the eternal rays.
**Malay:**
70 Tanpa menjawab, aku mengangkat mataku, 71 dan aku melihatnya yang sedang membuat mahkota untuk dirinya sendiri, 72 memantulkan dari dirinya sendiri cahaya abadi.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
73 Da quella regïon che più sù tona 74 occhio mortale alcun tanto non dista, 75 qualunque in mare più giù s’abbandona,
76 quanto lì da Beatrice la mia vista; 77 ma nulla mi facea, ché süa effige 78 non discendëa a me per mezzo mista.
query.result:
**English:**
73 From that region which thunders highest 74 no mortal eye is so far distant, 75 as any that sinks lowest in the sea,
76 as far was my sight from Beatrice there; 77 but nothing made me doubt, for her image 78 did not descend to me through a mixed medium.
**Malay:**
73 Dari wilayah yang bergemuruh paling tinggi 74 tidak ada mata manusia yang begitu jauh, 75 seperti siapa pun yang tenggelam paling dalam di laut,
76 sejauh itu pandanganku dari Beatrice di sana; 77 tetapi tidak ada yang membuatku ragu, karena bayangannya 78 tidak turun kepadaku melalui media campuran.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
79 «O donna in cui la mia speranza vige, 80 e che soffristi per la mia salute 81 in inferno lasciar le tue vestige,
82 di tante cose quant’ i’ ho vedute, 83 dal tuo podere e da la tua bontate 84 riconosco la grazia e la virtute.
query.result:
**English:**
79 "O lady in whom my hope is strong, 80 and who suffered for my salvation, 81 leaving your footprints in hell,
82 of all the many things that I have seen, 83 I recognize the grace and the virtue 84 from your power and from your goodness.
**Malay:**
79 "Wahai wanita yang padanya harapanku tumbuh, 80 dan yang menderita demi keselamatanku 81 meninggalkan jejak kakimu di neraka,
82 dari sekian banyak hal yang telah kulihat, 83 dari kekuasaanmu dan kebaikanmu 84 kuakui kasih karunia dan kebajikan.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
85 Tu m’hai di servo tratto a libertate 86 per tutte quelle vie, per tutt’ i modi 87 che di ciò fare avei la potestate.
query.result:
**English:**
85 You have brought me from servitude to liberty 86 through all those ways, through all those modes 87 by which you had the power to do so.
**Malay:**
85 Engkau telah membawaku dari perbudakan menuju kebebasan 86 melalui semua jalan itu, melalui semua cara itu 87 yang dengannya engkau memiliki kuasa untuk melakukannya.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
88 La tua magnificenza in me custodi, 89 sì che l’anima mia, che fatt’ hai sana, 90 piacente a te dal corpo si disnodi».
query.result:
**English:**
88 Keep your magnificence in me, 89 so that my soul, which you have made whole, 90 may be pleasing to you when it is separated from the body.
**Malay:**
88 Simpanlah keagungan-Mu di dalam diriku, 89 sehingga jiwaku, yang telah Kau buat utuh, 90 menyenangkan bagi-Mu ketika ia terpisah dari tubuh.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
91 Così orai; e quella, sì lontana 92 come parea, sorrise e riguardommi; 93 poi si tornò a l’etterna fontana.
query.result:
**English:**
91 Thus she prays; and that one, as distant 92 as she seemed, smiled and looked at me; 93 then she returned to the eternal fountain.
**Malay:**
91 Demikianlah dia berdoa; dan yang itu, sejauh 92 seperti yang terlihat, tersenyum dan menatapku; 93 kemudian dia kembali ke mata air abadi.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
94 E ’l santo sene: «Acciò che tu assommi 95 perfettamente», disse, «il tuo cammino, 96 a che priego e amor santo mandommi,
97 vola con li occhi per questo giardino; 98 ché veder lui t’acconcerà lo sguardo 99 più al montar per lo raggio divino.
query.result:
**English:**
94 And the holy elder said: "In order that you may complete 95 your journey perfectly," he said, "to which holy prayers and love send me,
97 fly with your eyes through this garden; 98 for seeing it will prepare your gaze 99 more for ascending through the divine radiance.
**Malay:**
94 Dan orang tua yang suci itu berkata: "Agar engkau dapat menyelesaikan 95 perjalananmu dengan sempurna," katanya, "yang kepadanya doa-doa suci dan cinta mengirimiku,
97 terbanglah dengan matamu melalui taman ini; 98 karena melihatnya akan mempersiapkan pandanganmu 99 lebih untuk naik melalui cahaya ilahi.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
100 E la regina del cielo, ond’ ïo ardo 101 tutto d’amor, ne farà ogne grazia, 102 però ch’i’ sono il suo fedel Bernardo».
query.result:
**English:**
100 And the queen of heaven, for whom I burn 101 all with love, will grant us every grace, 102 because I am her faithful Bernard."
**Malay:**
100 Dan ratu surga, yang kepadanya aku menyala 101 seluruhnya dengan cinta, akan memberi kita setiap rahmat, 102 karena aku adalah Bernard yang setia padanya."

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
103 Qual è colui che forse di Croazia 104 viene a veder la Veronica nostra, 105 che per l’antica fame non sen sazia,
106 ma dice nel pensier, fin che si mostra: 107 ‘Segnor mio Iesù Cristo, Dio verace, 108 or fu sì fatta la sembianza vostra?’;
109 tal era io mirando la vivace 110 carità di colui che ’n questo mondo, 111 contemplando, gustò di quella pace.
query.result:
**English:**
103 Like one who perhaps from Croatia 104 comes to see our Veronica, 105 who for the ancient hunger is not satisfied,
106 but says in his thoughts, as long as it is shown: 107 ‘My Lord Jesus Christ, true God, 108 was your likeness really like this?’;
109 such was I gazing at the lively 110 charity of him who in this world, 111 contemplating, tasted of that peace.
**Malay:**
103 Seperti orang yang mungkin dari Kroasia 104 datang untuk melihat Veronica kita, 105 yang karena kelaparan kuno tidak merasa puas,
106 tetapi berkata dalam pikirannya, selama itu diperlihatkan: 107 ‘Tuhan Yesus Kristus, Tuhan yang sejati, 108 apakah benar rupa-Mu seperti ini?’;
109 begitulah aku memandang yang bersemangat 110 kasih sayang dari dia yang di dunia ini, 111 merenungkan, menikmati kedamaian itu.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
118 Io levai li occhi; e come da mattina 119 la parte orïental de l’orizzonte 120 soverchia quella dove ’l sol declina,
121 così, quasi di valle andando a monte 122 con li occhi, vidi parte ne lo stremo 123 vincer di lume tutta l’altra fronte.
query.result:
**English:**
118 I lifted my eyes; and as in the morning 119 the eastern part of the horizon 120 surpasses the part where the sun declines,
121 so, almost going from valley to mountain 122 with my eyes, I saw a part at the edge 123 overcome all the other face with light.
**Malay:**
118 Aku mengangkat mataku; dan seperti di pagi hari 119 bagian timur cakrawala 120 melampaui bagian tempat matahari terbenam,
121 begitu, hampir dari lembah menuju gunung 122 dengan mataku, aku melihat sebagian di ujung 123 mengalahkan semua wajah lainnya dengan cahaya.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
124 E come quivi ove s’aspetta il temo 125 che mal guidò Fetonte, più s’infiamma, 126 e quinci e quindi il lume si fa scemo,
127 così quella pacifica oriafiamma 128 nel mezzo s’avvivava, e d’ogne parte 129 per igual modo allentava la fiamma;
130 e a quel mezzo, con le penne sparte, 131 vid’ io più di mille angeli festanti, 132 ciascun distinto di fulgore e d’arte.
query.result:
**English:**
124 And as here, where the time is awaited 125 that Phaeton misruled, it grows hotter, 126 and on this side and that the light grows dimmer,
127 so that peaceful golden flame 128 grew brighter in the middle, and on every side 129 the flame diminished equally;
130 and in that middle, with their wings outspread, 131 I saw more than a thousand angels rejoicing, 132 each distinct in brilliance and artistry.
**Malay:**
124 Dan seperti di sini, di mana waktu ditunggu-tunggu 125 yang salah dipandu oleh Phaeton, semakin panas, 126 dan di sisi ini dan itu cahayanya semakin redup,
127 nyala api keemasan yang damai itu 128 semakin terang di tengah, dan di setiap sisi 129 apinya berkurang sama rata;
130 dan di tengah itu, dengan sayap-sayap yang terbentang, 131 kulihat lebih dari seribu malaikat yang bersukacita, 132 masing-masing berbeda dalam kecemerlangan dan seni.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
139 Bernardo, come vide li occhi miei 140 nel caldo suo caler fissi e attenti, 141 li suoi con tanto affetto volse a lei,
142 che ’ miei di rimirar fé più ardenti.
query.result:
**English:**
139 Bernardo, when he saw my eyes 140 fixed and intent on his warm smile, 141 turned his own to her with such affection,
142 that it made my desire to look at her even more ardent.
**Malay:**
139 Bernardo, ketika dia melihat mataku 140 terpaku dan penuh perhatian pada senyumannya yang hangat, 141 mengalihkan pandangannya padanya dengan penuh kasih sayang,
142 sehingga membuat keinginanku untuk memandangnya semakin membara.
